name: The Viking Hero
description:
You need to collect shiny things. You can play by pressing "A" and "D", and SPACE to jump... This game is Still in development progress. You can Exit the GAME MANUALLY!

There is a great need to add some dialogues... becouse there is a FRIENDLY GHOST (This blue one ;) ), he is lightning the path of our Viking Hero.... he'll give some advices to a player aswell. He is a big part of our adventure history.

Font is created by Andrew Tyler, All parts of Game Design is my own work.

ENJOY IT ;)
